answers.answer: Hi,How are you? What symptoms are present? The cervical canal is lined by tissue similar to the uterus. Thickening can be associated with any imbalance between the hormones (high levels of estrogen and low levels of progesterone) such as found found in menopause, irregular menstrual cycle, diabetes, Hormone replacement therapy (HRT) among other things.  Further evaluation may need to be done by your doctor or gynecologist for proper diagnosis. Cervical polyp should also be ruled out with pelvic examination. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: WHAT DOES THICKING OF THE CERVIX MEAN ? I HAD LASER TREATMENT THN WENT FOR A SCAN AND THE DOCTOR SAID I HV THICKING ON THE CERVIX I HV ANA PPOINTMENT AS HOPSITAL IN 1 WEEK . WHAT IS IT ??
title: cervix
